name: Liborio the Shapemancer
description:
IMPORTANT: Liborio is a Ludum Dare Jam game. It's made in less than 72 hours.

INTRODUCTION
Liborio the Shapemancer, a mischief maker that has been captured and imprisoned, so he now awaits punishment. Will you help Liborio to fool his captors and escape the dungeon?

HOW TO SHAPESHIFT
You can copy the physical aspect of any living form that is unconscious -dead, shocked or sleeping- if you move close to it and press the Spacebar.

You can left unconscious almost any character of the game (even a small rat!) if you take the form of something that scare or makes it really nervous.

CONTROLS
Movement : Cursors keys or ASDW
Shapeshifing : Spacebar near an unconscious character
